items.sentence: We aren\'t rich enough to buy a house on Park Street.
We can\'t afford to lose Tom from the team right now.
We certainly wouldn\'t want that to happen, would we?
Tom and Mary invited John and Alice to their wedding.
How could that have happened without anyone noticing?
Tom didn\'t tell me what time I should come tomorrow.
Tom didn\'t win the race, ruining his perfect record.
The cave was so dark that they had to feel their way.
Could you please tell me where the nearest church is?
Do you ever get told that you look like someone else?
If you make your own clothes, it will save you money.
Tom watched a cartoon with his children after dinner.
Tom went abroad soon after he graduated from college.
Tom went to visit Mary even though I told him not to.
Tom will be in the hospital for at least three weeks.
Tom will be leaving for the airport in a few minutes.
Tom injured himself when he jumped out of the window.
Tom grew up in a town where everybody knew everybody.
Tom had a good reason for wanting to leave the house.
He made a resolution to write in his diary every day.
